news.title: My Take | Tesla is getting love from Chinese state media, but can the affair last?
news.content: Communist Party mouthpiece People's Daily praised Tesla for sparking an EV boom, but Musk's role in a new Trump administration could complicate matters.

news.title: Tuesday's big stock stories: What's likely to move the market in the next trading session
news.content: Earnings reports from Walmart and Lowe's will give investors a glimpse at consumer spending on Tuesday morning, while SpaceX readies for another launch.

news.title: Why Electric Vehicle Stocks Were on Fire on Monday
news.content: Shares of electric vehicle stocks started off on the right foot this week after reports emerged that President Trump's administration will look to lessen regulatory burdens for autonomous driving. It's not clear exactly what that means, and Elon Musk's involvement is a point of interest here, but ...

news.title: Short Squeezes With Big Promises - GameStop  ( NYSE:GME )
news.content: Short squeezes have been making and breaking investors for a century. One of the greatest short squeezes in history started on a SubReddit, where hundreds of thousands of retail investors drove the price of GameStop GME shares up to an all-time high.

news.content: ( 0:45 ) - What Role Does Tidal Play When Bringing ETFs To Market ( 3:50 ) - What Is Driving The Growth In The ETF Industry Right Now? ( 6:20 ) - What Impact Will A Trump Presidency Have On The Stock Market? ( 11:30 ) - What Is Causing The Rise In Active ETFs?
